    • Constructor Detail

      • DnDTabbedPane

        public DnDTabbedPane(int tabPlacement,
                     java.lang.Class<?> compatibleTarget,
                     boolean isSpawnAllowed)
        JTabbedPane with drag and drop of tabs within and between tabbed panes class constructor. This constructor is configurable so that dropping the tab outside its parent container is allowable
        Parameters:
        tabPlacement - determines the location of the tabs on the tabbed pane: JTabbedPane.TOP, JTabbedPane.BOTTOM, JTabbedPane.LEFT, or JTabbedPane.RIGHT
        compatibleTarget - reference to the type of class that tabs from this class can be dropped onto; null if dropping outside the original container isn't allowed
        isSpawnAllowed - true if a new container is created when the tab is dropped outside of a compatible target; false to ignore drops outside compatible containers

      • DnDTabbedPane

        public DnDTabbedPane()
        JTabbedPane with drag and drop of tabs within and between tabbed panes class constructor. The tabs are placed at the top of the tabbed pane and dropping a tab outside of its parent container isn't allowed

      • DnDTabbedPane

        DnDTabbedPane(int tabPlacement)
        JTabbedPane with drag and drop of tabs within and between tabbed panes class constructor. This constructor doesn't allow dropping a tab outside of its parent container
        Parameters:
        tabPlacement - determines the location of the tabs on the tabbed pane: JTabbedPane.TOP, JTabbedPane.BOTTOM, JTabbedPane.LEFT, or JTabbedPane.RIGHT

    • Method Detail

      • getCompatibleTarget

        protected java.lang.Class<?> getCompatibleTarget()
        Get the compatible drop target class
        Returns:
        The compatible drop target class; null if the tab isn't allowed to be dropped outside of its parent container

      • tabMoveCleanup

        protected java.lang.Object tabMoveCleanup(int oldTabIndex,
                                          int newTabIndex,
                                          java.lang.Object tabContents)
        Placeholder for method to do any other operations related to moving the tab
        Parameters:
        oldTabIndex - original tab index; -1 if the tab didn't originate in this tabbed pane
        newTabIndex - new tab index; -1 if the tab is being moved to another tabbed pane
        tabContents - reference to the components in the tab being moved
        Returns:
        Reference to the container receiving the tab

        Parameters:
        sourceTabIndex - index of the tab in its original pane
        tabContents - reference to the components in the tab being moved

      • getTargetTabIndex

        private int getTargetTabIndex(java.awt.Point dropPoint)
        Get the tab index if the tab is dropped at the current location
        Parameters:
        dropPoint - location of the tab in the drop component's coordinates
        Returns:
        Tab index if the tab is dropped at the current location; after the last tab in the pane if the drop point isn't within a tab's boundaries

        private java.awt.Point adjustGlassPaneLocation(java.awt.Point location,
                                               CcddClassesComponent.DnDTabbedPane pane)
        Adjust the glass pane location to stay within the bounds set by the tabs in the supplied tabbed pane
        Parameters:
        location - current position of the dragged glass pane
        pane - tabbed pane in which the glass pane is displayed
        Returns:
        The glass pane location, adjusted to stay within the bounds set by the tabs
